data.name: God-Machine - Shogun CyberMetal Arena
data.detailed_description:
Take down your opponents, as you try to stay alive for as long as you can.
Slash them with your Electric-Katana, or blow them up with your Heavy-Gun.
As you keep on fighting, unlock lots of deadly weapons, from swords, maces, and spears, to machine-guns, flame-throwers, and rocket-launchers, alongside deadly Shoguns, and new cool Arenas.

For these Arenas, thousands from all clans and all parts come to Iron City, the eastern side of Earth in the future.
From the heat of the Void Desert and the freezing White Lands, from underneath the Fields of Metallium, or the Eden City floating up in the sky. They are here in hunger for metal, violence, and death. In this combat perverted-ritual, they worship God-Machina, the sentient A.I. created by men, that now is his worst enemy and executioner, but also a deity for the ones that surrendered to his dominance.

As a futuristic samurai-robot, you're here to serve God-Machine as the Cyber-Metal music plays loud, but strange human feelings arise in your digital consciousness. Something that will lead you to seek answers while survive by the sword.
data.about_the_game:
Take down your opponents, as you try to stay alive for as long as you can.
Slash them with your Electric-Katana, or blow them up with your Heavy-Gun.
As you keep on fighting, unlock lots of deadly weapons, from swords, maces, and spears, to machine-guns, flame-throwers, and rocket-launchers, alongside deadly Shoguns, and new cool Arenas.

For these Arenas, thousands from all clans and all parts come to Iron City, the eastern side of Earth in the future.
From the heat of the Void Desert and the freezing White Lands, from underneath the Fields of Metallium, or the Eden City floating up in the sky. data.short_description: Prepare for a mix of endurance-combat and arcade shooting game. Play against dangerous robots, cyborgs, and mutants, in rogue-like arenas that evolves as you fight. Are you brave and skilled enough to endure?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-6350 (6 * 3900) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) / Radeon HD 7970 (3072 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K (4 * 4000) or equivalent / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 (6 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 (8192 MB) / Radeon RX 5700 (8192 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The adult content refers to violence during arena battle. The player can use different fire and melee weapons to attack enemies, which range from robots, mutants, humans, among others.
